lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic recovered from a mediocre start to reach the French Open quarter-finals on Wednesday with a 3-6 6-4 6-1 7-5 rain-delayed victory over plucky Spaniard Roberto Bautista Agut.
snippet: Novak Djokovic recovered from a mediocre start to reach the French Open quarter-finals on Wednesday with a 3-6 6-4 6-1 7-5 rain-delayed victory over plucky Spaniard Roberto Bautista Agut....

headline.main: Djokovic Labours Into French Open Quarter-Finals
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Labours Into French Open Quarter-Finals
